channel.title: 'JAVA' Is not recognized
channel.description:
Yes yes yes, this had been asked dozens of times, I know what to do I just don't know what the code for my batch file would be if it is a client. What I also don't get is why it was working fine yesterday but today when I went to boot up my client It did not work. I did not uninstall JAVA either...
Anyway what would I replace my current code with?
[code]@ECHO OFF TITLE Client color 0c JAVA -Xmx500m EGUI PAUSE[/code]

item.description:
@jungledude wrote:

[quote=“zezimaisme111, post:14, topic:169069”][quote author=silly_faggit link=topic=228729.msg1963862#msg1963862 date=1199057082]

come back to these forums when your old enough and stop thinking your cool, k?

and you need to set up environmental values, follow the how to make a server post by god of ikiliki[/quote]

Already set them

silly_faggit:

Red the rules, learn to code and fuck off this is a useful post my computer turned into a fag overnight and I just want to know why bitch! I already have set up my server and my client used to run until this morning. Fuck off Silly Faggot because you are a Silly Faggot

silly_faggit:

Dell!! I have u3… Can you personal message me the thing I need to set it as? I Cant get mine to work, and I think you just found my problem!

Now you’ve become the master of Useless Posting.

I also would never turn into Stormcutter lolol you dumbass

So Faggot if you’re not going to help why come to the section and Spam it up with your useless picture?

Fuck off leave me alone and go fuck youself…

item.title: 'JAVA' Is not recognized
item.dc:creator: @Hockey4lifexx Hockey4lifexx
item.description:
@Hockey4lifexx wrote:

[quote=“jungledude, post:8, topic:169069”][quote author=Syrillia link=topic=228729.msg1963430#msg1963430 date=1199041726]
I can’t post my compiler/runner, because it’s too long to put in a post, but that should work. It will auto-set you paths, try that. BTW, jungledude, hows zyberscape going, haven’t been on the site in a while.
[/quote]

My paths are already set.

Yeah Aaron got us a domain now http://zyberscape.com/smf/index.php is our new forums if you want to check it out. Its basicaly jumped to a new level with a new and good host a new domain and a sick client.

heres 1 that WOLFDAWG gave me credits go to him, but it should work i had the same problem.

[code]TITLE woofdawg23’s awsome compiler + runner
@ECHO OFF
CD files
color 09

:info
CLS
ECHO woofdawg23’s awsome compiler + runner
ECHO.
ECHO ~By Woofdawg23~
ECHO If you leech i will take to further actions…
ECHO.
ECHO
ECHO.
ECHO ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
ECHO.
ECHO Type r to Run Client.
ECHO.
ECHO Type c to Compile.
ECHO.
ECHO Type e to Exit.
ECHO.
SET option=
SET /p option=choose an option please . . .
if %option%==r goto runclient
if %option%==c goto compile
if %option%==e exit

:runclient
@echo off
TITLE WideScreen Client
java -Xmx500m -cp . client
pause
ECHO.
ECHO.
GOTO info

:compile
@echo off
COLOR 09
title compile
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin\javac” -cp . *.java
pause
ECHO
ECHO
GOTO info[/code]

All that is is a mess with the same problem because the code I need is not in there I used to have it…[/quote]

did u accually try it tho?

Read full topic
